Arrow puts Airbomber on.

Airbomber: Infectra? Is that you really?...
  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
=
  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:24 AM
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)
=


  Armada



  Armada: Airbomber? You mean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on=
...I guess...


  (Armada says back in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:17 AM
    Subject: Re: B=
ig Post(with fries)


    Arrow: Hera that, Airbomber? She USED to be Infec=
tra!

    Airbomber: You can't fool me, you just got someone who sounds jus=
t like her to pose as her...LET ME TALK TO HER!

    Arrow: Airbomber wants=
 to talk to you, Infectra. I mean, Armada...
      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
      From: *Orchid* 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: S=
unday, March 18, 2001 3:10 AM
      Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


   =
   Armada



      (Armada listens to the voice coming over her commlink.)
=


      Armada: Actually, no. But that was my original name. I'm Armada now=
. Who is this?


      (Armada says into the commlink and awaits an answer =
from Arrow.)

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice=
 Omega 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, March 1=
7, 2001 10:19 PM
        Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


        Airbom=
ber: But where do we go?

        Arrow: That's up to you, Airbomber, but I=
 wouldn't lie to you.

        Train Wreck: Actually, he WOULD lie to you, =
but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

        Stranato: I didn't see it=
, but I believe it.

        Airbomber: But how can that be?

        Arrow=
: Call her.

        Airbomber: I tried that.

        Arrow: You don't kee=
p track of those kind of things? I'll call her.

        Arrow calls Armada=
 by commlink.

        Arrow: Is there anyone named Infectra there?...

   =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: Alloran2@... 
    =
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 =
4:56 PM
          Subject: Big Post(with fries)


          OOC: Please add=
 the new Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
          Syria.=
 

          :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

          Ramjet: Th=
e one extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
       =
   by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Maxima=
ls 
          and Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a=
 large faction 
          of Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders t=
here, and i think we might 
          be able to work out an Alliance with =
them. 
          ~~~~~ 
          Wheeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type s=
hape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
          ~~~~~ 
          Vulois: Yes,=
 lets. I think we should first go to the Maximals, for they will 
         =
 be the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
   =
       Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
          ::he walks out of his=
 cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
          ~~~~~ 
          ::Time Warp=
 was releived that they were friends, until he heard what they 
          s=
aid about Infectra:: 
          Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I d=
idnt know her very well, but she 
          definately wasnt Alliance mater=
ial!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
          guys are fools. 

  =

.

ervice. 



      Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms =

    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Term=
s of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use=
 of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
